Entry.name: AK
Entry.value: Transfer to the Next Service Request Handler has been Acknowledged

Entry.name: BH
Entry.value: Transfer to Service Request Handler not Capable of Reporting Further Status

Entry.name: DL
Entry.value: Delivered Interchange by Service Request Handler

Entry.name: RD
Entry.value: Redirected by Service Request Handler to an Alternate Receiver as Identified in the Reference Code

Entry.name: RJ
Entry.value: Rejected by Service Request Handler; See Error Reason Code for Cause

Entry.name: TR
Entry.value: Transferred to Next Service Request Handler by Service Request Handler, but not yet Acknowledged
